scope.description: All content pages of the Online Loket website on the subdomain https://pdc.cg-intern.acc.utrecht.nl/nl. The evaluation does not cover any PDF files or Webchat widgets present on the website.
scope.title: Gemeente Utrecht Online Loket

defineScope.accessibilitySupportBaseline: Chrome version 126.0.6478.63, Edge version 121.0.2277.112, Firefox version 127.0.1, Safari version 17.5 (19618.2.12.11.6) with VoiceOver
defineScope.additionalEvaluationRequirements: This report highlights only the problems found; no solutions are offered for the reported issues.

exploreTarget.essentialFunctionality: - completing and submitting a form provided on the website

structuredSample.title: Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven - Startpagina
Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven - Aanvraag zonder DigiD - Uw klacht
Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven - Aanvraag zonder DigiD - Uw gegevens
Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven - Aanvraag zonder DigiD - Bijlagen toevoegen
Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven - Aanvraag zonder DigiD - Overzicht

result.description:
- Issue: Some icon images (DigiD) lack accessible text. The button next to them does not include the information conveyed by the image. The image is ignored by the screenreader, making the button text ("Geef verhuizing door") less understandable for screenreader-only users than for sighted users.  
  Example: [Verhuizing doorgeven - Button](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/products/verhuizing-doorgeven)

result.description:
- Issue: The meaning of the asterisks next to the input field labels on the form is never defined. Users are left to assume they indicate that the related input field is mandatory.  
  Example: [Form - Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

result.description: - Issue: Not all suitable input fields on the [Uw gegevens](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-gegevenscompleet) page have the autocomplete attribute, preventing the browser from automatically filling them out.

result.description: - Issue: The [Overzicht (Controleer en Bevestig)](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/overzicht) page has some required checkboxes with a red border. The color red is the only indicator that the checkbox is invalid.

result.description:
- Issue: Some icon images (DigiD) lack accessible text. The button next to them does not include the information conveyed by the image. The image is ignored by the screenreader, making the button text ("Geef verhuizing door") less understandable for screenreader-only users than for sighted users.  
  Example: [Verhuizing doorgeven - Button](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/products/verhuizing-doorgeven)

result.description:
- Issue: The visual order of the 3 buttons ("Tussendoor opslaan", "Volgende", and "Afbreken") and the link ("Vorige") at the bottom of the Main landmark of the form changes depending on the zoom level, resulting in an unexpected tabbing order when zoomed in.  
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

result.description:
- Issue: The content of the tooltips on the form obscures non-decorative content when zoomed in and hovered over. The tooltip content cannot be dismissed by pressing the Escape key.  
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

subject.description: All content pages of the Online Loket website on the subdomain https://pdc.cg-intern.acc.utrecht.nl/nl
subject.title: Gemeente Utrecht Online Loket

result.description:
- Issue: The content of the tooltips on the form is not accessible for keyboard-only users (or screenreader users).  
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

- Issue: The close button of the "Opslaan en later verdergaan" modal, used to save one's progress on the form, does not allow the keyboard user to focus on it. If no content is filled in and the user presses the "Later verdergaan" button, this button becomes disabled, meaning the user can only close the modal by pressing the Escape key.  
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

subject.description: All content pages of the Online Loket website on the subdomain https://pdc.cg-intern.acc.utrecht.nl/nl
subject.title: Gemeente Utrecht Online Loket

result.description:
- Issue: The focus on the dropdown menu "Klacht over de gemeente doorgeven" (located in the main landmark of the form), which appears when zoomed in, does not stay contained within itself. When tabbing outside of it, the dropdown menu stays open, obscuring the contents of the page.  
  Example: [Uw gegevens](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-gegevenscompleet)

result.description:
- Issue: The error messages for the input fields on the form are inconsistent and incomplete. The  input fields on the [Uw gegevens](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-gegevenscompleet) page do not provide enough information about the required data format. Only the "Telefoonnummer" input field offers a helpful error message, but this error message only appears after some numbers are entered in that input field. When the input field is empty, the error message is "Het verplichte veld Telefoonnummer is niet ingevuld."

- Issue: An error message is missing for the radio button group (on the first page [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht) of the form) when nothing is filled out and the "Volgende" button is clicked. The unhelpful error message ' "null" is een ongeldige keuze. ' appears only if all the other input fields of the page have been filled out and then the user clicks the "Volgende" button.


- Issue: The error messages are not read by the screenreader.
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

subject.description: All content pages of the Online Loket website on the subdomain https://pdc.cg-intern.acc.utrecht.nl/nl
subject.title: Gemeente Utrecht Online Loket

result.description:
- Issue: No text instructions are given at the beginning of the [Uw gegevens](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-gegevenscompleet) page that describe the necessary input for the required input fields and their formatting. For example, the "Telefoonnummer" input field only shows the helpful error message "Dit is geen geldig internationaal telefoonnummer. Een geldig voorbeeld van een internationaal telefoonnummer is +31612312312.Dit is geen geldig Nederlands telefoonnummer. Een geldig voorbeeld van een Nederlands telefoonnummer is 0612312312." if the user writes at least one number inside it. If the input field is empty, the error message is "Het verplichte veld Telefoonnummer is niet ingevuld."

- Issue: The Search input field has a label, but the input within it has not. The aria-labelledby attribute in 2 places refers to an element that does not exist on the page.  
  Example: [Bijlagen toevoegen](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/bijlagen-toevoegen-klacht)

subject.description: All content pages of the Online Loket website on the subdomain https://pdc.cg-intern.acc.utrecht.nl/nl
subject.title: Gemeente Utrecht Online Loket

result.description: - Issue: The suggestions for correcting errors are not always adequate. The error message for the radio button group (from the first page [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht) of the form) when nothing is filled out and the "Volgende" button is clicked is ' "null" is een ongeldige keuze.'. The error message is only provided if the mandatory input fields on the same page have been filled in. Otherwise, no error message is shown for the mandatory radio button group at all.

result.description:
- Issue: The tooltip content on the form obscures non-decorative content when zoomed in and hovered over. The tooltip content cannot be dismissed by pressing the Escape key.
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

- Issue: The content of the tooltips on the form is not accessible for keyboard-only users (or screenreader users).  
  Example: [Uw Klacht](https://loket.digitaal.utrecht.nl/nl/form/klacht-over-de-gemeente-doorgeven/stap/uw-klacht)

reportFindings.summary: The accessibility of the website has improved considerably since the last evaluation. Some issues are present on several pages due to the repeated use of certain components, but most of the issues are found on the evaluated form. The report shows that 28 success criteria have been met and 16 have not. We take accessibility very seriously and will work hard to improve the website to achieve a better evaluation score in the near future.
reportFindings.evaluationSpecifics: Evaluation tools used: Polypane, axe DevTools, Accessibility Insights for Web, WAVE (Web Accessibility Evaluation Tool), Landmarks preferences, HeadingsMap, Text Spacing.
